message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.SD

This paper presents a new mathematical construction for the restricted Boltzmann machine (RBM) and focuses on its application in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of RBM in various applications such as computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.NE). The paper also mentions the use of RBM in deep learning (cs.SD) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
